Text.Page:
Youâ€™ve found where the butterflies are coming from. Now go inside and see if you can find out why.

[Your equipment level must be at least 463 to enter Gossamer Vault.]

. The place that Elleon show you appeared to be an artificial nest.

defeated Queen Regent's guardian, the Hellgrammite, then, with Amarre's help, was able to reach the Regent's Vault.

There, successfully defeated the queen, and Amarre gathered samples from the butterflies.

, Amarre.

I'm glad to see that you're both alright.

What happened? What did you find down there?"Well..."

A nest? Down there?

An artificial hatching room?

This is all too convenient to be a coincidence.

The unknown flying object from northern Arun...it has to be connected...

We can't be entirely certain...but we also can't just stand here and do nothing. We should inform the federation. I need to get Jelena here, and investigate further.

, thanks to you, I've got more data in the last hour than I could've gotten in ten years, working on my own.

I should collate what I got and report back to the Mysterium. Thank you so much. I hope we meet again.
